name: shotshare
description: Shotshare is a self-hosted screenshot and image sharing service. It lets users quickly upload captures, get shareable links, and manage their image history in a clean web UI.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Quickly uploads screenshots and images via web interface or API

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Generates short URLs for instant image sharing

features.title: Direct Image Hosting
features.description: Serves images directly without requiring viewers to visit a page

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Maintains a gallery of all uploaded images for easy access

features.title: Drag And Drop
features.description: Supports drag-and-drop file uploads in the browser

features.title: Api Access
features.description: Provides REST API for integration with screenshot tools like ShareX
